title: Kwan Yin Travel-Size Lined Journal
features: Kwan Yin, the goddess of compassion and mercy, graces the cover of this journal from Duirwaigh Studios. With inspiring artwork sprinkled throughout its lined pages, it is perfect for recording your meditations, prayers, poems, or diary entries.
Printed on paper sourced from a combination of sustainably managed forests and recycled materials
Printed on paper sourced from a combination of sustainably managed forests and recycled materials
Published by Amber Lotus, an independent carbon-negative US company that has planted more than half a million trees since 2008
Published by Amber Lotus, an independent carbon-negative US company that has planted more than half a million trees since 2008
description: Before the era of YouTube, Angi Sullins created the short inspirational film,
, which went viral in a word-of-mouth campaign, garnering over four million fans. She is the author of
Doorways and Dreamfields: A True Fairy Tale
, and highlights from her popular Message from the Muse blog were collected into her first audio book,
Flaming Muse: Matchstick Tales that Ignite the Soul

. As the founder and president of Duirwaigh Studios, a multimedia design studio creating products and services that inspire soulful imagination, she has helped artists and aspiring creatives find their unique voice, while molding a space in today's market for creative consciousness. Her words and original works of art can be found on hundreds of greeting cards, calendars, journals, and collectibles worldwide. She dwells in the state of enchantment with her husband and creative partner, Silas Toball.

author: {'avatar': 'https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/amzn-author-media-prod/t4nj6fqk8961jr1t99hr7fljtu._SY600_.jpg', 'name': 'Amber Lotus Publishing', 'about': ['WE PLANT TREES to offset our carbon footprint — more than ONE MILLION and growing!', 'We honor the Earth and are actively offsetting the environmental impact of our publishing business.', 'Each year we plant more than 20 times the number of trees used to create our products to offset our carbon footprint and resource usage. Through our partnership with Trees for the Future, Amber Lotus has planted 1,201,000 trees since 2008.', '• Owned by a husband-and-wife team based in Portland, Oregon.', '• Founded in 1988 — designing beautiful, inspirational calendars for over 30 years.', '• Showcases the texts of teachers and authors such as Thich Nhat Hanh, Pema Chödrön, Eckhart Tolle, Mark Nepo, and Ram Dass.', '• Features exceptional work by artists and photographers such as Katie Daisy, Geninne Zlatkis, Catrin Welz-Stein, Lynn Karlin, and David M Bird.', '• Achieves a carbon-negative status with our tree-planting initiative.', '• Chooses paper sourced from a combination of recycled materials and wood harvested from socially and environmentally sustainable forests.']}
